EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Invite 3 - from Sales - EN (webinar format)
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now for Tricentis Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales>
Accelerate - October 22nd, 2015 Novomatic Forum, Vienna 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. Followed by buffet & reception
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
I would like to personally invite you to Tricentis Accelerate 2015. Join us for an inspiring day full of seminars, workshops, and networking. Register now <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales> to secure your free ticket!
You can also now find the event program <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate> online. We look forward to meeting you in Vienna!
Best regards,
Alexander Laubert Regional Sales Manager Schweiz Tricentis o - +41 79 909 8607 e - a.laubert@tricentis.com
PS: Highlights from Accelerate 2014 can be found here <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/accelerate-2014/>.
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales> Thu, Oct 22, 2015 9:00 – 17:00 Uhr
Alexander Laubert Regional Sales Manager Schweiz Tricentis
